snippet: The police say a prostitute provided a statement about the bloody killing, which was featured in Crime Scene last week.
abstract: The police say a prostitute provided a statement about the bloody killing, which was featured in Crime Scene last week.

headline.main: 3 Arrests in Beating Death Overheard by Landlady
headline.print_headline: 3 Arrested in Beating Death Heard by Victim’s Landlady
